fails.list: ⛔ Failed to get the list of tracked links.
fails.untrack: ⛔ Failed to untrack the provided link.
fails.track: ⛔ Failed to track the provided link.
fails.unknown: ⛔` Unknown command. You can view the available commands by entering /help command

descriptions.name: /help
descriptions.description: prints the list of available commands with descriptio

descriptions.name: /track
descriptions.description: begin the process of adding the provided link

descriptions.name: /list
descriptions.description: prints the list of a tracking links

descriptions.name: /cancel
descriptions.description: return the user to the menu

replies.registration: 👋 Hi and welcome! I'm Go Track and I'll be you link manager =) You can view the list of available commands by pressing /help.
replies.track: ❕ Please, enter the tracking link! (press /cancel to quit)
replies.untracked: 🔕 This link is longer being track!
replies.untrack: ❕ Please, enter the link you want to untrack! (press /cancel to quit)
replies.tags: ❕ Please, enter link tags separated by space. (press /cancel to quit)
replies.filters: ❕ Please, enter link filters as filter:value. (press /cancel to quit)
replies.tracking: 🔔 This link is now being track!
replies.tags_ack: ❔ Do you want to specify tags? (press /cancel to quit)
replies.filters_ack: ❔ Do you want to specify filters? (press /cancel to quit)

manuals.link: ⚠️ Invalid URL. Please enter a valid link (e.g. https://github.com/golang/go).
manuals.tags: ⚠️ Invalid tags. Use spaces to separate (e.g. 'work hobby').
